lead_paragraph: A reality TV show titled "The Ultimate Survivalist" features six contestants who will be thrown together for six days in a simulated postapocalyptic wasteland. Located in a remote part of West Virgina, the contestants discover that they really are in a fight for survival against a family of hideously deformed, inbred cannibals.
